item.title: [PI] Talking Npcs (Npchandeler.java) need help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434964.0.html someone told me it worked fine for [PI]

alright so i see what your saying about forcechat. (please bare with me im new)

the example i see is for barrows. it says…

if(server.model.minigames.Barrows.COFFIN_AND_BROTHERS[c.randomCoffin][1] == newNPC.npcType) {
newNPC.forceChat(“You dare steal from us!”);

so would i be something like…

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
newNPC.forceChat(“Could you help me?”);

(im making an event : D)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Talking Npcs (Npchandeler.java) need help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

i still get 100 errors

Heres my code:

public void process() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null) continue;
npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();

	}
            
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
				npcs[i].actionTimer--;
			}

			
			if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Text goes here.";
                    }

			
                    if (npcs[i].freezeTimer > 0) {
				npcs[i].freezeTimer--;
			}

Could u help me fix it please?

Read full topic
